level.heading: Inventory of successor personal representative.
level.text: Except as provided in section 20-731, within 3 months of appointment, a supervised successor personal representative shall either file a new inventory to replace the inventory filed by a previous personal representative or file a written consent to the items as listed and valued in such previous inventory.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-72
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 20-701.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-241
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 20-701.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 10-241: See Application of Law 10-241 and Emergency act amendment notes to § 20-701.01.
